data.title: The European Union and the US will begin formal talks on a free-trade agreement, paving the way for the biggest trade deal in history.
‘Totally drug-resistant’ TB uncovered, outbreak would be untreatable
A French court declares Monsanto guilty of chemical poisoning
Iceland considering ban of online pornography

Russian cop faces 5 years in jail after leaving disabled man to die on street in -40C: After losing his fingers as a result of twelve hours spent in subzero temperatures, a disabled man has died from a blood clot in a Russian hospital
A man burns himself to death outside a job centre in France after being declared ineligible for unemployment benefit
‘Canada will never be a safe haven for zombies,’ Foreign Minister John Baird tells House of Commons
Egypt floods Gaza tunnels to cut Palestinian lifeline
Australian Lower house passes legislation that will make way for a referendum to finally recognise Australian Aboriginals in the constitution.
North Korea Nuclear Test: Japan, South Korea Ready Armies Following Provocation
